trans-unit.source: Represents a COM class that is described in a manifest.
trans-unit.target: Stellt eine COM-Klasse dar, die in einem Manifest beschrieben wird.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ComClass" /> class.
Gets the class identifier (ClsId) for a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ComClass" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Ruft den Klassenbezeichner (CLSID) für ein <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ComClass" />-Objekt ab.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> formatted in the pattern {xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx}, where the value of the GUID is represented as a series of lower-case hexadecimal digits in groups of 8, 4, 4, 4, and 12 digits and separated by hyphens.
trans-unit.target: Eine gemäß dem Muster {xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx} formatierte <see cref="T:System.String" />. Dabei wird der Wert der GUID als Folge klein geschriebener Hexadezimalzeichen in Gruppen von 8, 4, 4, 4 und 12 Ziffern dargestellt, die durch Bindestriche voneinander getrennt sind.

trans-unit.source: An example of a return value is "{382c74c3-721d-4f34-80e5-57657b6cbc27}".
Gets the description of a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ComClass" /> object.
A description of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ComClass" /> object.
Gets the programmatic identifier (ProgId) of a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ComClass" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Ruft den programmatischen Bezeichner (ProgId) eines <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ComClass" />-Objekts ab.

trans-unit.source: The programmatic identifier of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ComClass" /> object.
Gets the threading model of a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ComClass" /> object.
A string such as "Apartment".
Gets a value that is the identifier of the type library that contains type information about the class.
trans-unit.target: Ruft einen Wert ab, der der Bezeichner der Typbibliothek mit den Typeninformationen über die Klasse ist.

trans-unit.source: The identifier of the type library that contains type information about the class.
trans-unit.target: Der Bezeichner der Typbibliothek mit den Typeninformationen über die Klasse.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> formatted in the pattern {xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx}, where the value of the GUID is represented as a series of lower-case hexadecimal digits in groups of 8, 4, 4, 4, and 12 digits and separated by hyphens.
trans-unit.target: Eine gemäß dem Muster {xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx} formatierte <see cref="T:System.String" />. Dabei wird der Wert der GUID als Folge klein geschriebener Hexadezimalzeichen in Gruppen von 8, 4, 4, 4 und 12 Ziffern dargestellt, die durch Bindestriche voneinander getrennt sind.

trans-unit.source: An example of a return value is "{382c74c3-721d-4f34-80e5-57657b6cbc27}".
Gets or sets a property that is used to serialize the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ComClass.ClsId" /> property to an XML file.
trans-unit.target: Dient zum Abrufen oder Festlegen einer Eigenschaft, die verwendet wird, um die <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ComClass.ClsId" />-Eigenschaft in eine XML-Datei zu serialisieren.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ComClass.ClsId" /> property.
Gets or sets a property that is used to serialize the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ComClass.Description" /> property to an XML file.
trans-unit.target: Dient zum Abrufen oder Festlegen einer Eigenschaft, die verwendet wird, um die <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ComClass.Description" />-Eigenschaft in eine XML-Datei zu serialisieren.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ComClass.Description" /> property.
Gets or sets a property that is used to serialize the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ComClass.ProgId" /> property to an XML file.
trans-unit.target: Dient zum Abrufen oder Festlegen einer Eigenschaft, die verwendet wird, um die <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ComClass.ProgId" />-Eigenschaft in eine XML-Datei zu serialisieren.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ComClass.ProgId" /> property.
Gets or sets a property that is used to serialize the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ComClass.ThreadingModel" /> property to an XML file.
trans-unit.target: Dient zum Abrufen oder Festlegen einer Eigenschaft, die verwendet wird, um die <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ComClass.ThreadingModel" />-Eigenschaft in eine XML-Datei zu serialisieren.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ComClass.ThreadingModel" /> property.
Gets or sets a property that is used to serialize the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ComClass.TlbId" /> property to an XML file.
trans-unit.target: Dient zum Abrufen oder Festlegen einer Eigenschaft, die verwendet wird, um die <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ComClass.TlbId" />-Eigenschaft in eine XML-Datei zu serialisieren.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ComClass.TlbId" /> property.
